title: Episode 206: The Dutch Angle
itunes:title: Episode 206: The Dutch Angle
description:
Episode 206: A Dutch immigrant gives us a view of the United States from the outside, and a view of the Netherlands from the inside: immigration, taxes, social safety nets, and community.

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!

http://www.cooperationandcoercion.com
